tutorials.title: Prerequisites
tutorials.description: Prerequisites to run the Oracle Data Safe workshop in the free tier.

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab provides information about the Oracle Data Safe workshop.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Enable Oracle Data Safe in Your Tenancy
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to enable the Oracle Data Safe service in a region of your tenancy.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Provision an Autonomous Database and Register It with Oracle Data Safe
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to  provision an Autonomous Data Warehouse on Shared Exadata Infrastructure, load sample data into it, and register it with Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Provision Audit and Alert Policies
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to provision audit and alert policies in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Analyze Alerts and Audit Reports
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to analyze alerts and audit reports in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Assess Database Configurations and Users
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to assess database configurations and users in your Autonomous Database by using the User Assessment feature in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Discover and Mask Sensitive Data
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to discover and mask sensitive data in Oracle Data Safe by using the Data Discovery and Data Masking features.
